results.summary: The agent report is accurate in identifying the root cause and provides logical reasoning, but lacks some metric details and actionable recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured but lacks explicit mention of CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: VCORE percentage is correctly identified, but DDR and CPU frequencies are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No practical fixes or historical references are provided.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality

dimensions.name: Actionability

results.summary: The agent report is accurate in identifying root causes and provides a logical causal chain, but lacks some metric precision and actionable recommendations.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the CM and MMDVFS as root causes, but did not explicitly mention 拉檔 (frequency throttling).

dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete, but lacks explicit mention of the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.explanation: The agent report includes some correct metrics but misses specific CPU frequencies and DDR percentages.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
